duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure financial data integrity, internal controls, compliance, and budgeting.
Lead procurement, HR, IT oversight, and general office functions.
Manage, develop, and motivate a team of professionals, translating business objectives into team's Finance objectives and managing performance.

Provide strategic and operational finance business partnering to the local Leadership team, country and global TechOps & R&D Finance teams, and advise and challenge business with insightful financial analysis.
Identify and assess risks at site level, recommend and implement pro-active risk mitigation measures, and define, implement, and maintain internal control systems.

Drive productivity improvements, period-end closing and reporting, inventory management and validation, financial budgeting and planning, costing, treasury tasks, tax management, management information systems, projects and improvements, compliance and integrity, and collaboration.
Manage or work closely with additional area functions including procurement and HR.

education_certification.credential: CPA or University master degree in Finance or Economics. 10+ years’ experience in Finance, preferably in bio-pharma or similarly regulated industry.
